name: NEXA_ESP32
description: Brings NEXA to embedded devices. Write your own hardware wallet, vending machine or any other bitcoin-powered device. Supports public and private keys, HD wallets, transactions and scripts. Everything required to start working with Bitcoin on microcontrollers.

name: uBitcoin
description: Brings Bitcoin to embedded devices. Write your own hardware wallet, vending machine or any other bitcoin-powered device. Supports public and private keys, HD wallets, transactions and scripts. Everything required to start working with Bitcoin on microcontrollers.
